Gastric: Thirsty, excessive nausea; obstinate constipation; hemorrhoids
Desire for sweets, also acid things
Head: Pain in eyeballs; supraorbital pains, photophobia
Loss of sense of smell
Nasal catarrh, profuse, watery discharge
Unilateral headache; reflex uterine, congestive headache, better open air and by free flow
Back: Pain along spine radiating to abdomen and thighs
Female: Delayed and irregular menses; menstrual colic; amenorrhoea, pain in ovaries before flow; menorrhagia, irritable bladder, leucorrhoea

details: Has extensive sphere of action on female organs. Amenorrhoea and metrorrhagia.Saraca indica - AMENORRHOEA, pain. ARTIPLEX Uterine symptoms, amenorrhoea; hysteria, coldness between shoulders, dislike of warm food, craves strange foods, palpitation, sleeplessness.
Common names: Bark of an Indian Tree, introduced by Dr. N.D. Ray, Calcutta
name: Jonosia asoca
